    • Method Detail

      • getRawShape

        protected Shape getRawShape(VisualItem item)
        Description copied from class: AbstractShapeRenderer
        Return a non-transformed shape for the visual representation of the item. Subclasses must implement this method.
        Overrides:
        getRawShape in class EdgeRenderer
        Parameters:
        item - the VisualItem being drawn
        Returns:
        the "raw", untransformed shape.
        See Also:
        AbstractShapeRenderer.getRawShape(prefuse.visual.VisualItem)

      • getUpdateRoutePointsOnNodeMove

        public boolean getUpdateRoutePointsOnNodeMove()
        If this property is set the route points of an edge are removed or new points inserted when the node is moved.
        Returns:
        true if edge route points are updated on the fly when moving nodes

      • setUpdateRoutePointsOnNodeMove

        public void setUpdateRoutePointsOnNodeMove(boolean update)
        If a node is moved then the route points of its edges can be updated on the fly. This has a small performance penalty and it might not be desired that route points are removed/inserted. Thus the default is false.
        Parameters:
        discard - true if the route points should be modified on the fly
